backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purpose and behavior of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark Valentine-themed color tokens and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component coordinating scene progression, scroll jumps, and asset preloading.
frontend/src/components/valentine/assets: Exports paths for Valentine-themed image and audio assets.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Contin: Floating continue button with bounce animation that triggers scene-advance callbacks.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Letter: Exports exact multiline Valentine letter text for display.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Loadin: Full‑screen loading overlay with heart icon and progress bar.
frontend/src/components/valentine/MovieT: Interactive bouncing ticket scene that becomes catchable when unlocked and triggers completion after capture.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Openin: Mailbox→envelope→letter reveal sequence with ambient audio and continue prompt.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Scratc: React scene showing a framed image with a scratch-off overlay that reveals a Valentine message once scratched past 60%.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAmbientAudio.ts: Hook to preload, start, and stop looping ambient audio.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetPreloader.ts: Preloads images and audio, tracking loading state and progress.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and helpers for managing Internet Identity login, state, and persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are used.
frontend/src/hooks/useScratchOffCanvas.t: Implements scratch-off canvas logic that tracks pointer interactions and scratch completion percentage.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining Valentine color palette, fonts, utilities, and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entrypoint initializing React, query client, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color variables, playful fonts, radius utilities, shadows, and multiple float/bounce/unfold animations with keyframes.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s schema, current UX issues, aesthetic direction shift, and feature requirements for a playful Valentine’s interactive single‑page experience.
